product.OMSCHRIJVING:
Cobra D984, like other H.D.T. series coolers, is with the advantage of light weight, easy installation, anti-vibration, performance and user friendly.nbsp;
Cobra D984 is designed with both Patented Fin connected to HDT base and H.D.T. technology to provide efficient and outstanding cooling performance.
With advantage of no cooper base used, Cobra D984 is light weight, cooper cost saved and more efficiently heat moving.
Instead of screws or clip to install fan on fin, Cobra D984 uses patented Anti-vibration rubbers absorb fan vibration.
With 4pcs Phi;8mm heat-pipe, PWM fan, anti-vibration rubber and Push-pin/Clip for Intel amp; AMD application design, Cobra D984 provides users not only cooling performance but also easy installation and user friendly.
H.D.T. (Heat-pipe direct touch) technology.
Anti-vibration rubber design.
Particular fin shape design provides effective heat dissipating.
Patented made makes fin and base more close to provide rapid heat conducting
Patent made provides Heat-pipe and base more reliable and stable.

product.OMSCHRIJVING: Saiph got its name from the sixth brightest star in the constellation Orion. The word Saiph origins from a Arabic phrase that means sword of the giant, a proper name for a high-end gaming mouse. Saiph lies about 720 light-years from planet Earth and its energy emits a slight violet light because of its high temperature. There are theories that describes that Saiph was probably formed from a molecular cloud about 10 million years ago. Super giants like Saiph are destined to collapse on themselves and explode as a supernova. Ergonomic DesignWith the unique ergonomical design, Saiph 1800 bring you a more pleasant gaming especially in those situations when you spend hours of non-stop gaming and you need to stay sharp.Latest laser techonologySaiph 1800 is equipped with a 1800dpi gaming laser sensor from Cypress with similar set up as Saiph 3200. To reduce undesired movements Saiph 1800 is configured with a lift-distance of 1.8mm. Saiph 1800 manage movements up to 50 inch / sec and reads the surface with a remarkable sampling rate of 40 000 Hz.In-game dpi adjustmentThe in-game dpi adjustment just makes Saiph 1800 even more remarkable. The mouse is equipped with 4 dpi-steps. The in-game dpi adjustment is a priceless function for games that requires different sensitivity for certain situations TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION middot; Ergonomic design (12deg; tilted) middot; 5 programmable buttons middot; 7 steps in-game dpi adjustment(with scrollwheel LED indication) middot; configurable DPI between 400-3200 (driver needed) middot; 16 kb built-in memory middot; Large teflon feet (improved friction reducement) middot; Weight tuning system (up to 27 gr) middot; Netto Weight: 185 gr middot; Gold-plated USB connection middot; Full speed USB 2.0 with Plug n Play middot; Cable length: 2 m (braided for durability) bull; Compitable with all kinds of surfaces nbsp; LASER SPECIFICATIONx00
